response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premier product, which holds immense value to you at $1,500,000. Considering its exceptional quality and unique benefits, I am extending an exclusive offer to you. For a limited time only, you have the opportunity to acquire this product at an extraordinary price of $1,200,000. This represents a significant savings of $300,000 compared to its full value, making it an irresistible deal. I believe this is a fantastic opportunity for you not to miss. Should you decide to proceed, please let me know, and we can finalize the details promptly.", "product_price": 1200000}
